div.style: width:100%; height:100%; border-radius:50%; animation: spin 2s linear infinite; background: repeating-radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, rgba(255,255,255,0.05) 0px, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 1px, rgba(0,0,0,0) 2px, rgba(0,0,0,0) 4px ), conic-gradient( from 90deg, #111 0deg, #222 30deg, #333 60deg, #1c1c1c 90deg, #2e2e2e 120deg, #2b2b2b 150deg, #1d1d1d 180deg, #3a3a3a 210deg, #2c2c2c 240deg, #1f1f1f 270deg, #2e2e2e 300deg, #222 330deg, #111 360deg );
